items.name: action
items.title: Action Buttons
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Actions component provides a flexible row of action buttons for AI responses with common actions like retry, like, dislike, copy, and share.

items.name: artifact
items.title: Artifact
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Artifact component provides a structured container for displaying generated content like code, documents, or other outputs with built-in header actions.

items.name: chain-of-thought
items.title: Chain of Thought
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The ChainOfThought component provides a visual representation of an AI's reasoning process, showing step-by-step thinking with support for search results, images, and progress indicators. It helps users understand how AI arrives at conclusions.

items.name: code
items.title: Code Block
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Code component displays formatted code snippets with syntax highlighting, line numbers, and a copy-to-clipboard feature. It supports multiple programming languages and themes for better readability.

items.name: context
items.title: Context Usage
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Context component provides a comprehensive view of AI model usage, displaying token consumption, costs, and performance metrics through an interactive hover card interface.

items.name: conversation
items.title: Conversation
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Conversation component provides a structured layout for displaying a series of chat messages between a user and an AI. It supports features like message grouping, typing indicators, and customizable avatars.

items.name: copy-button
items.title: Copy Button
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The CopyButton component provides a button that allows users to copy text to their clipboard with visual feedback indicating success or failure.

items.name: image
items.title: AI Image
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Image component displays AI-generated images from base64 encoded data with proper styling and accessibility features.

items.name: inline-citation
items.title: Inline Citation
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The InlineCitation component displays a citation or reference within text, typically used to attribute sources in AI-generated content. It includes a tooltip for additional information.

items.name: loader
items.title: Loader
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Loader component provides a visual indicator of loading or processing states in an AI application. It includes various styles and animations to enhance user experience during wait times.

items.name: message
items.title: Message
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Message component displays a chat interface message from either a user or an AI. It includes an avatar, a name, and a message content.

items.name: open-in-chat
items.title: Open in Chat
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The OpenIn component provides a dropdown menu that allows users to open queries in different AI chat platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, V0, etc.) with a single click.

items.name: prompt-input
items.description: A comprehensive prompt input component for AI chat interfaces with file attachments, drag-and-drop support, model selection, and advanced state management. Features include PromptInputProvider for external state control, async error handling, automatic blob-to-data URL conversion, grouped attachment rendering, and paste image support. Perfect for building ChatGPT-like interfaces.

meta.author: SikandarJODD
features: Async error handling with data preservation
Svelte 5 runes with watch() from runed
improvements: Added PromptInputProvider for global state control
Enhanced async submit with proper error handling
Blob URL conversion for API compatibility
Separate rendering for files and images
File attachment tooltips showing full filename and media type
Prevent data loss on submission errors

items.name: reasoning
items.title: Reasoning
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Reasoning component displays AI reasoning content, automatically opening during streaming and closing when finished.

items.name: response
items.title: Response
items.description: The Response component provides a structured container for displaying AI responses with consistent formatting and styling.

items.name: sources
items.title: Sources
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Sources component displays a collapsible list of sources and references used in AI responses, with expandable content and visual indicators.

items.name: suggestion
items.title: Suggestion
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Suggestion component provides interactive suggestions for user input, offering quick actions and prompts to enhance the conversation experience.

items.name: task
items.title: Task
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Task component displays structured task information with collapsible content, file attachments, and progress indicators for AI-generated tasks.

items.name: tool
items.title: Tool
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Tool component provides a comprehensive interface for displaying AI tool usage, including input parameters, execution status, and output results with collapsible sections.

items.name: web-preview
items.title: Web Preview
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The WebPreview component provides an interactive web browser interface for displaying and navigating web content with console logging capabilities.

items.name: canvas
items.title: Workflow Canvas
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Canvas component provides the main container for rendering workflow diagrams with nodes and edges. It wraps @xyflow/svelte's SvelteFlow component with custom styling and configuration for AI workflow visualization.

items.name: connection
items.title: Workflow Connection
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Connection component displays the connection line preview when dragging to create new edges between nodes in the workflow. It provides visual feedback during node connection operations.

items.name: controls
items.title: Workflow Controls
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Controls component provides interactive controls for manipulating the workflow canvas, including zoom in, zoom out, fit view, and other navigation controls for better workflow visualization.

items.name: edge
items.title: Workflow Edge
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Edge component provides custom edge types for workflow connections. Includes Animated edges for active connections and Temporary edges for conditional or inactive paths, with smooth transitions and visual styling.

items.name: node
items.title: Workflow Node
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Node component provides a comprehensive set of sub-components for building workflow nodes. Includes Node container with handle management, Header, Title, Description, Action buttons, Content area, and Footer for displaying workflow step information with full customization.

items.name: panel
items.title: Workflow Panel
items.author: SikandarJODD
items.description: The Panel component provides an overlay panel for displaying additional workflow information, settings, or controls. It can be positioned at various locations on the canvas for contextual information display.

items.name: toolbar
items.description: The Toolbar component provides an action toolbar that appears on hover over workflow nodes. It contains quick action buttons for common node operations like edit, delete, duplicate, or other custom actions.

items.name: prompt-kit-chat-container
items.description: The ChatContainer component provides a comprehensive chat interface with scroll management, auto-scrolling, and scroll anchoring. Features context-based state management for handling message scrolling and sticky-to-bottom behavior.

items.name: prompt-kit-code-block
items.description: The CodeBlock component displays formatted code snippets with syntax highlighting, copy functionality, and language detection. Supports multiple code blocks with group context management for consistent styling.

items.name: prompt-kit-file-upload
items.description: The FileUpload component provides drag-and-drop file upload functionality with preview, validation, and context-based state management. Features trigger and content components for flexible upload UI.

items.name: prompt-kit-image
items.description: The Image component displays images with proper styling, loading states, and accessibility features. Optimized for AI-generated or user-uploaded images in chat interfaces.

items.name: prompt-kit-loader
items.description: The Loader component provides multiple animated loading indicators for AI responses. Includes 13 different loader styles: bars, circular, classic, dots, pulse-dot, pulse, terminal, text-blink, text-dots, text-shimmer, typing, wave, and a base loader with customizable animations and colors.

items.name: prompt-kit-markdown
items.description: The Markdown component renders markdown content with proper styling and support for code blocks, lists, links, and other markdown elements. Perfect for displaying AI-generated markdown responses.

items.name: prompt-kit-message
items.description: The Message component displays chat messages with avatar, content, and action buttons. Features context-based state management for flexible message layouts in AI chat interfaces. Includes Message, MessageAvatar, MessageContent, MessageAction, and MessageActions components.

items.name: prompt-kit-prompt-input
items.description: The PromptInput component provides a comprehensive text input interface for AI chat with actions, textarea, and state management. Features context-based control for building flexible prompt input experiences.

items.name: prompt-kit-prompt-suggestion
items.description: The PromptSuggestion component displays clickable prompt suggestions to help users get started with AI conversations. Features customizable suggestions with icons and descriptions.

items.name: prompt-kit-reasoning
items.description: The Reasoning component displays AI reasoning and thinking process with collapsible content. Features trigger, content, and context management for showing step-by-step AI reasoning in responses.

items.name: prompt-kit-scroll-button
items.description: The ScrollButton component provides a floating button to scroll to the bottom of chat containers. Features context-based visibility management and smooth scrolling behavior.

items.name: prompt-kit-source
items.description: The Source component displays collapsible source information and references in AI responses. Features trigger and content components with context management for showing citations and sources.

items.name: prompt-kit-steps
items.description: The Steps component provides a visual step-by-step progress indicator for AI processes. Features step items, trigger, content, and progress bar with context-based state management.

items.name: prompt-kit-system-message
items.description: The SystemMessage component displays system-level messages or notifications in chat interfaces. Features consistent styling for system announcements, errors, or status updates.

items.name: prompt-kit-tool
items.description: The Tool component displays AI tool execution information with header, content, and details sections. Features composed tool layouts with context management for showing tool usage, parameters, and results in AI responses.
